sections.title: Portfolio tracking
sections.text: Stay on top of your portfolio's growth with comprehensive tracking, including insights into yield-bearing tokens.

sections.title: Advanced analysis features
sections.text: Utilize advanced analysis features such as on-chain PNL, multi-account aggregation, and asset selection or removal.

sections.title: Yields analalysis
sections.text: Analyze yield APY trends and efficiently reallocate your portfolio to optimize returns.
